documents.title: Start here
documents.summary: Entry page defining typed flags, deterministic evaluation, and safe parse boundary.

claims.statement: Konditional models feature declarations through namespace-owned typed feature definitions.
Runtime configuration ingestion is exposed through a snapshot loader that returns Result and supports typed parse failures.

documents.title: Product value and fit
documents.summary: Fit criteria for deterministic rollout, safe boundary handling, and namespace isolation.

claims.statement: Deterministic ramp-up behavior is backed by stable bucketing functions.

claims.statement: Namespace-scoped runtime operations are implemented by an in-memory namespace registry.

documents.title: Why typed flags
documents.summary: Rationale for compile-time typed feature declarations and explicit boundary handling.

claims.statement: Feature declarations are modeled as typed entities under Namespace and Feature abstractions.
Parse boundary failures are represented with explicit ParseError and KonditionalBoundaryFailure types.

documents.summary: Decision page routing users through typed flags, ramp-up, and snapshot loading paths.

claims.statement: The first-success routes correspond to concrete runtime APIs for ramp-up and snapshot loading.

documents.summary: Phased adoption with rollout, boundary validation, and rollback operations.

claims.statement: Adoption phases rely on load, disable, and rollback runtime operations.

documents.title: Quickstart
documents.summary: Entry sequence covering declaration, deterministic rollout, and safe snapshot loading.

claims.statement: The quickstart sequence is grounded in namespace declaration and snapshot loading APIs.

documents.title: Install
documents.summary: Dependency setup for core declarations and runtime registry operations.

claims.statement: Installation targets the core namespace model and runtime in-memory registry implementation.

documents.title: Define first flag
documents.summary: Defines namespace-scoped typed feature declarations with defaults.

claims.statement: Feature declarations are represented by Namespace, Feature, and FlagDefinition types.
Namespaces provide a compiled schema used by boundary codecs and loaders.

documents.title: Evaluate in app code
documents.summary: Evaluates a typed feature for a context and validates deterministic behavior.

claims.statement: Feature evaluation follows core flag-definition evaluation semantics and deterministic bucketing behavior.

documents.summary: Adds rollout gating with stable bucket assignment.

claims.statement: Ramp-up assignment is deterministic and exposed through stable bucket APIs.

documents.summary: Loads runtime snapshots through explicit Result boundary handling.

claims.statement: Snapshot loading API exposes Result-based ingestion with options and codec-backed decode.

claims.statement: Boundary failures are modeled as ParseError values wrapped by KonditionalBoundaryFailure.

documents.summary: Validation checklist for deterministic evaluation, safe boundary errors, and stable runtime state.

claims.statement: End-to-end verification relies on deterministic bucketing, boundary parse types, and namespace runtime operations.
